exercise.p: Convert \frac{15}{4} from an improper fraction to a mixed number using a diagram.

aside.p: Diagrams are not forever. But they are important enough to practice a few times.

exercise.p: Completely reduce the fractions \frac{12x y^4}{18x^4 y^2} and \frac{12 (x+2)(x-3)^4}{18(x+2)^4 (x-3)^2}.
Completely reduce the fractions and \frac{9 \sin(x) \cos^3(x)}{12 \sin^2(x) \cos(x)}.

aside.p: Note: \sin^n(x) is a shorthand for \left(\sin(x) \right)^n and \cos^n(x) is a shorthand for \left( \cos(x) \right)^n.

exercise.p: Completely reduce the fraction \frac{x^2 + 5x + 6}{x^2 - 3x - 10}.

aside.p: Hint: Factor, then trust your experience to guide you from there.
